title: Annual Holiday Pop-Up Shop Benefiting Variety The Children's Charity of NY
desc:
AMCONYC's Annual Holiday Pop-Up has been confirmed! 
 This year AMCONYC is hosting their Annual Holiday Pop-Up Shop benefiting Variety The Children's Charity of NY. 
 
 Complimentary champagne for shoppers! 
 Free gift wrapping with all purchases! (see details below) 
 Live music by DJ VLAD! 
 Special guest appearances! 
 Custom Bloody Mary Bar by Stoli Vodka! 
 
 All proceeds from the gift wrapping booth will be donated to Variety The Children's Charity of NY. Since 1948, Variety has made a difference in the lives of children by providing essential funds to non-profit organizations in the tri-state area. 
 So, save the date, mark your calendars and join over 10 innovative and handcrafted local brands. If you're a last minute shopper, this is perfect for you! 
 Press & Media hours are from 1pm-3pm. Please RSVP to pr@amconyc.com 
 Vendor inquiries please email amconyc@gmail.com
